cab.content: SECRET^Li. 1640. WAR CABINET,OIL FUEL SITUATION.Copy of letter dated 7th August, 1917 from the Fourth Sea Lord to the Secretary,War Cabinet.Dear Sir Maurice Hankey,With reference to your letter dated 2nd July, the particulars to date as regards oil fuel stocks are as follows:-Tons.(a) Stock of oil fuel in the UnitedKingdom this morning. 630,000(b) On the way from loading Ports. 229,000(c) Quantities for which it Isanticipated shipping will be available during the ensuing four weeks. 330,000Yours very truly, (Sgd) HUGH TOT HILL.
